title: Bug splat
body: Is anyone else loading into a ranked game then. BUG SPLAT and it tells you you have corrupted files. I was so close to promos 2 but I had 2 afk and lose 20lp and now have 5 bans. WTF{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

replies.body:
Bug splats can be caused by a number of different factors, but in your case, it sounds like this is potentially a problem with your files becoming continuously corrupted. I recommend working through the common solutions we've consolidated in our [Bugsplat & Crash guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes)

Let me know if this issue persists.

So. I played 2 ranked games today and in secound one i had bug splat after loading.
I seen one frame from game and get bug splat. (after load to 100%)
Its create any conflict w spacedesk??

win7 n w media feature
i5 4760k
gtx970

i tried repair opction and update drivers.
